title: Yo-Kai Watch: The Story Of King Nyarthur
alternative_title: Yo-kai Watch: La Historia del Rey Nyarthur ; まんが ニャーサー王物語 ; Yo-kai Watch: The Story of King Nyarthur
status: Yo-kai Watch: La Historia del Rey Nyarthur ; まんが ニャーサー王物語 ; Yo-kai Watch: The Story of King Nyarthur
description:
Description :
        Official comicalization of the event in "Yo-Kai Watch Punipuni", "King Nyarthur Story"!
What is the fate that awaits Jibanyan who accidentally pulled out the legendary holy sword?
Enjoy a new adventure with manga and games!
